Housing Options 


Residential Education and Campus Housing





















 
Move Out 2023


Students, please be aware that the deadline to move out is 24 hours after your last final. Students who have a final on Friday of Finals Week are required to move out no later than 11:00 a.m. on May 20, 2023. Before you move out, make sure to change your mailing address, recycle, donate, and, throw away trash, and restore your residence. For more information, visit the Move Out webpage.



  






You are hereREACH Home ›  
Housing Options






Your Sonoma Home
Deciding where to live at Sonoma State University can be a big deal! Whether you're a first-time freshman, transfer, graduate or returning student, we have housing options for you including single, double, or triple occupancy rooms. You can choose from several options (based on availability). The earlier you apply for housing, the more options you will have to add to your preferences during room selection.
Our housing options are far from ordinary, with open and spacious living spaces that include suite-style and apartment-style housing. You can enjoy your own room and bathroom, and benefit from countless opportunities for social interaction, academic growth, and community engagement.
Check out our available housing options below.


Beaujolais Village


Room Type: Single


Price: $$$


Year: Sophomore +, Transfers & Graduate


Community: General Housing


Location: Residential Community East



Cabernet Village

Room Type: Double and Triple
Price: $$
Year: First Years
Community: General Housing and Live Well
Location: Residential Community West




Sauvignon Village

Room Type: Single, Double, and Triple
Price: $$ and $$$
Year: First Years, Sophomore +, Transfers & Graduate
Community: General Housing, V.I.B.E.S and Unity House
Location: Residential Community West


Tuscany Village

Room Type: Single and Double
Price: $$ and $$$
Year: Sophomore +, Transfers & Graduate
Community: General Housing and Transfer House*
Location: Residential Community East
 




Verdot Village

Room Type: Single, Double, and Triple
Price: $ and $$
Year: First Years
Community: General Housing and Academic Achievement
Location: Residential Community West


Zinfandel Village

Room Type: Single and Double
Price: $ and $$
Year: First Years
Community: General Housing
Location: Residential Community West


*Proposed Location
